questions.question: How was Gnosticism generally viewed by mainstream Christianity?
choices: As the true interpretation of Christ's teachings

questions.question: How has the discovery of the Nag Hammadi Library affected our understanding of early Christianity?

questions.answer: It revealed a more diverse religious landscape than previously understood

questions.question: Which of the following is a common theme in Gnostic creation myths?
choices: The material world as a perfect creation

The absence of evil in the cosmos

questions.question: What is the significance of the number 52 in relation to the Nag Hammadi Library?
choices: The number of years it took to translate the texts
The number of texts contained in the codices
The number of scholars involved in the initial study
questions.answer: The number of texts contained in the codices

questions.question: How do Gnostic teachings generally view the attainment of gnosis?
choices: As something easily achieved by everyone
As reserved only for a spiritual elite
